classic.name: Skaros Rock
classic.description: Centuries-old castle ruins on a craggy outcrop, accessed by a steep track for caldera views.

classic.name: Santorini Wine Museum
classic.description: Museum below ground in a cave focusing on regional winemaking history, with tours & tastings.

classic.name: Castle of Oia
classic.description: Sea views from the surviving watchtower of a Renaissance-era castle built to guard against pirates.

classic.name: Theotokopoulos Main Square
classic.description: Busy, compact square offering sea views & lined with quaint shops, al fresco restaurants & cafes.

classic.name: Ancient Thera
classic.description: Accessible by hiking, this ancient mountaintop city features ruins & dramatic ocean views.

classic.name: Tomato Industrial Museum, D.Nomikos
classic.description: Former factory turned museum tracing the history of Santorini's tomato paste industry.

classic.name: Santo Wines
classic.description: Scenic winery offering walking tours, tastings & nibbles, plus an ample terrace with caldera views.

foodie.name: Pitogyros Traditional Grill House - Gyros, souvlaki, kebab.
foodie.description: Low-key restaurant with a terrace preparing local staples including souvlaki & gyros.

foodie.name: Metaxi Mas
foodie.description: Traditional local dishes served in a laid-back hillside restaurant that has a patio & sea views.

foodie.name: Roka Oia
foodie.description: A traditional local menu is paired with a wine list at this snug venue set in a historic building.

foodie.name: Franco's Cafè
foodie.address: Epar.Od. Pirgou Kallistis - Profiti Ilia, Pirgos Kallistis 847 00, Greece

cultural.name: Santorini Wine Museum
cultural.description: Museum below ground in a cave focusing on regional winemaking history, with tours & tastings.

cultural.name: Ancient Thera
cultural.description: Accessible by hiking, this ancient mountaintop city features ruins & dramatic ocean views.

cultural.name: Tomato Industrial Museum, D.Nomikos
cultural.description: Former factory turned museum tracing the history of Santorini's tomato paste industry.

cultural.name: Museum of Prehistoric Thera
cultural.description: Small archaeology museum featuring ancient artifacts from excavations on Santorini.

cultural.name: Lost Atlantis Experience - Interactive Museum
cultural.description: Interactive exhibits on the mythological sunken city, with a 9D movie, diorama & holograms.

cultural.name: Art Space Art Gallery - Winery - Museum

relaxation.name: Canaves Oia Suites
relaxation.description: Stylish suites in a polished seaside hotel featuring a chic restaurant/bar, plus an infinity pool.

relaxation.name: Aressana Spa Hotel and Suites
relaxation.description: Stylish quarters in a luxury hotel with an outdoor pool & a spa, plus fine dining & sea views.

relaxation.name: Rocabella Santorini
relaxation.description: Airy quarters offering caldera views in a polished hotel featuring a spa, dining & an outdoor pool.

relaxation.name: Santo Pure Oia Luxury Suites & Villas
relaxation.description: Chic quarters, some with pools, in an upscale hotel offering sea views, a restaurant & a spa.

relaxation.name: Andronis Luxury Suites
relaxation.description: Posh suites in a high-end hotel overlooking the sea, plus a spa, pools & refined dining.

relaxation.name: Suites of the Gods
relaxation.description: Upscale suites with caldera views at a plush hotel offering pools & a cafe, plus a spa in a cave.

relaxation.name: Sea Breeze Santorini Beach Resort, Curio Collection by Hilton
Desiterra Resort Santorini
relaxation.description: Chic hotel offering a swim-up bar & sea views, plus understated bungalows with private pools.

nightlife.name: Pelican Kipos cafe and wine restaurant
Karma | Oia
nightlife.description: Romantic venue with a terrace offering local dishes & desserts, plus coffee, wine & craft cocktails.

nightlife.name: Galini Cafe Santorini
nightlife.description: Chic hotel featuring bright rooms & cave-style villas, plus a rooftop cafe & free breakfast.
